page.title: 05LEISURE
page.content: The leisure facilities in our area are: the park, its facilities, the Speedway Stadium,the library, the Boxing Club and some other organised clubs. Many people visit East Park occasionally although it facilities are little used. Few children use the Stadium. The library near the school is well used but the Boxing Club attracts a few enthusiasts only. On Friday nights the young people can enjoy games such as Pool and Table tennis at an organised youth club. Refreshments are available. On Tuesdays boys can go to the Cubs.The uniform is green.They do good deeds for the community. In summer they go to camp. Later they can become Scouts. On Mondays girls can go to the Junoes Church club to learn about the Bible, First Aid and Nature. Many children belong to these organisations.
